name: Savory Cucumber Salad
author: NoRainOnMyParade
summary: I created this sour cream based recipe after trying several made with mayo, which I am not a fan of. This is a flavorful dish!
ingredients: ⅛ teaspoon salt, or as needed
¾ bunch green onions (white and pale green parts only), chopped
2 cloves garlic, or more to taste, minced
directions: Spread a paper towel over a large platter
Arrange cucumber slices in a single layer atop the paper towel
Sprinkle 1/8 teaspoon salt over the cucumber slices; refrigerate at least 2 hours and up to 6 hours
Mix sour cream, green onions, white sugar, apple cider vinegar, garlic, dill, paprika, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; refrigerate at least 1 hour and up to 4 hours
Pour sour cream sauce over the cucumbers and stir gently to coat
